parameter.name: Virtual library name
parameter.placeholdervalue: Choose a virtual library name

parameter.name: Limit to tracks from these virtual libraries
File path
parameter.placeholdervalue: complete or partial file path

parameter.name: File path
parameter.placeholdervalue: complete or partial file path

parameter.name: File path
parameter.placeholdervalue: complete or partial file path

parameter.name: Min. track length
parameter.placeholdervalue: secs

parameter.name: Max. track length
parameter.placeholdervalue: secs

parameter.name: Only include tracks after or equal to this year
parameter.placeholdervalue: yyyy

parameter.name: Only include tracks before or equal to this year
parameter.placeholdervalue: yyyy

parameter.name: Only include tracks from these years
parameter.placeholdervalue: comma-separated list of years

parameter.name: Exclude tracks from these years
parameter.placeholdervalue: comma-separated list of years

parameter.name: Only include tracks from these decades
parameter.data: select cast(((ifnull(tracks.year,0)/10)*10) as int) as decade, cast(((tracks.year/10)*10) as int)||'s', cast(((ifnull(tracks.year,0)/10)*10) as int) from tracks where tracks.audio = 1 and ifnull(tracks.year,0) > 0 group by decade order by decade asc

parameter.name: Only (un-)played tracks
parameter.data: 1=Only unplayed tracks,2=Only played tracks

parameter.name: Use APC values for play count and date last played
Only include tracks with a skip count of less than
Limit to last added tracks?
parameter.data: 604800=Added in the week before the last library import,1209600=Added in the 2 weeks before the last library import,2419200=Added in the 4 weeks before the last library import,7257600=Added in the 3 months before the last library import,14515200=Added in the 6 months before the last library import,29030399=Added in the 12 months before the last library import

parameter.name: Min. bitrate
parameter.placeholdervalue: kbps

parameter.name: Max. bitrate
parameter.placeholdervalue: kbps

parameter.name: Min. sample rate
parameter.placeholdervalue: Hz

parameter.name: Max. sample rate
parameter.placeholdervalue: Hz

parameter.name: Contributor roles for included artists
parameter.data: 1=Artist,5=Album Artist,6=Track Artist,3=Conductor,4=Band

parameter.name: Contributor roles for excluded artists
parameter.data: 1=Artist,5=Album Artist,6=Track Artist,3=Conductor,4=Band

parameter.name: Only tracks from works
parameter.data: 1=Only tracks from works,2=No tracks from works

parameter.name: File timestamp is after or equal to
parameter.placeholdervalue: dd/mm/yyyy

parameter.name: File timestamp is before or equal to
parameter.placeholdervalue: dd/mm/yyyy

parameter.name: Only include tracks from these static playlists
parameter.data: select tracks.id,tracks.title,tracks.titlesearch from tracks,playlist_track where content_type != 'cpl' and tracks.id=playlist_track.playlist group by tracks.id order by titlesort

parameter.name: Ignore tracks in these static playlists
parameter.data: select tracks.id,tracks.title,tracks.titlesearch from tracks,playlist_track where content_type != 'cpl' and tracks.id=playlist_track.playlist group by tracks.id order by titlesort

parameter.name: Only include tracks with this file format
Limit to remote / local tracks
parameter.data: 1=Only local library tracks,2=Only remote library tracks

parameter.name: Include custom tag 1
parameter.data: select id,attr,attr from customtagimporter_track_attributes where type='customtag' group by attr order by attr asc
lt=Less than,le=Less than or equal to,ge=Greater than or equal to,gt=Greater than,eq=Equal to (single value),contains=Contains (string),oneof=Equal to one of multiple values,hasvalue=Has a value

parameter.name: Custom tag 1 values
parameter.placeholdervalue: case sensitive + use semicolon to separate multiple strings

parameter.data: select id,attr,attr from customtagimporter_track_attributes where type='customtag' group by attr order by attr asc
